Palo Alto, CA -- Senior Engineer at Artillery -- Full time, H1Bs welcome

Envision a world where all gaming moves into the browser... One where anybody on earth can access every game, from any device, at any time. We've set out to change the face of gaming by dragging core gaming kicking and screaming into the browser using the latest HTML5 technology. Share this vision? Join us!

Currently we're leveraging open source technologies including Linux, C/C++, Python, JavaScript, Node.js and are keenly aware of all things HTML5, WebGL, and hardware-accelerated graphics.
